thread.title: iOS 10 now powers 79% of active devices, Android Nougat’s adoption barely 1%
thread.title_full: iOS 10 now powers 79% of active devices, Android Nougat’s adoption barely 1%

author: Christian Zibreg
title: iOS 10 now powers 79% of active devices, Android Nougat’s adoption barely 1%
text:
iOS 10 now powers nearly eight out of ten active devices—less than six months since officially releasing to the public in September of last year, as measured by App Store on February 20, 2017. To be precise—iOS 10 now powers 79 percent of active iPhone, iPad and iPod touch device out there, representing a three-point increase over iOS […]

_
